name: Introduction to Communication Studies
description: This course provides an overview of the field of communication studies, with a focus on theories of communication and the history of communication studies.

name: Introduction to Critical Cultural Studies
description: This course provides an introduction to the field of critical cultural studies, with a focus on understanding how cultural texts are produced, consumed, and interpreted.

name: Cultural Analysis
description: This course covers the methods and theories necessary for analyzing the cultural context of texts, with a focus on the production, circulation, and consumption of cultural products.

name: Cultural Criticism
description: This course covers the methods and theories necessary for critically analyzing cultural texts, with a focus on the power dynamics of cultural production and consumption.

name: Advanced Cultural Criticism
description: This course covers advanced methods and theories for critically analyzing cultural texts, with a focus on the power dynamics at play in the production and consumption of culture.
